entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:07 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 11:37 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -13.6°C
Wind: WSW 26 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
